title: Registered Nurse
description: We are looking for a dedicated Registered Nurse to join our team in London.
requirements: Valid nursing license in the UK; Minimum of 2 years of experience; Strong communication and interpersonal skills; Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.

title: Pediatric Nurse
description: We are hiring a Pediatric Nurse to work in our children's clinic in London.
requirements: Experience in pediatric care; Compassionate and patient-oriented; Strong teamwork skills.

title: Nurse Practitioner
description: We are seeking a skilled Nurse Practitioner to provide primary care in London.
requirements: Advanced nursing degree; Experience in a clinical setting; Excellent diagnostic skills.
